00063                 fseek( fp, 0, SEEK_END );
00064                 size = ( unsigned long )ftell( fp );
00065                 void* data = ReadFileAlloc( size + 1 );
00066                 fseek( fp, 0, SEEK_SET );
00067                 fread( data, size, 1, fp );
00068                 ( ( unsigned char* )data )[ size ] = 0;
00069                 fclose( fp );

00071                 return true;

00073 
00074         *dataOut = 0;
00075         size = 0;
00076         return false;

00093 //----------------------------------------------------------
00094 URef< RFile >
00095 RFileMgr::GetFile( const UPath& path, Flags flags )
00096 {
00098         while ( LockSwap( &_gate, LOCK_TAKEN ) == LOCK_TAKEN )
00099                 LockPause();
00100 
00102         UPath fullName;
00103         CreateFullPath( fullName, path );
00104 
00106         URef< RFile > file;
00107         FileMap::iterator iter = _files.find( fullName );
00108         if ( iter == _files.end() )
00109         {
00111                 void* fileHandle = FS_OpenFile( fullName.GetPathString().c_str(), ( unsigned int )flags );
00112                 if ( !fileHandle )
00113                 {
00115                         LockSwap( &_gate, LOCK_FREE );
00116 
00118                         return 0;
00119                 }
00120 
00122                 file = new RFile( fullName, fileHandle, flags & FILE_FLAGS_MASK );
00123 
00125                 _files[ fullName ] = file;
00126         }
00127         else
00128         {
00130                 file = iter->second;
00131 
00134                 unsigned int curAccess = file->GetFlags();
00135                 unsigned int newAccess = flags & ( FILE_FLAGS_MASK | FS_FILE_FLAG_CREATE_ALWAYS );
00136                 if ( ( newAccess & curAccess ) != newAccess )
00137                 {
00139                         unsigned int newFlags = ( curAccess | newAccess );
00140 
00142                         FS_CloseFile( file->GetHandle() );
00143                         void* fileHandle = FS_OpenFile( fullName.GetPathString().c_str(), newFlags );
00144 
00146                         file->Reset( fileHandle, newFlags );
00147                 }
00148         }
00149 
00151         LockSwap( &_gate, LOCK_FREE );
00152 
00154         return file;
00155 }

00174                 return 0;

00204                 return false;

00210 //----------------------------------------------------------
00211 bool
00212 RFileMgr::Exists( const UPath& relativeFilePath )
00213 {
00215         UPath name;
00216         CreateFullPath( name, relativeFilePath );
00217 
00219         DWORD attributes = GetFileAttributes( name.GetPathString().c_str() );
00220         if ( attributes == INVALID_FILE_ATTRIBUTES )
00221         {
00222                 GetLastError();
00223                 return false;
00224         }
00225 
00228         return true;
00229 }

00231 //----------------------------------------------------------
00232 void
00233 RFileMgr::CreateDir( const UPath& dirPath, bool relative )
00234 {
00235         UPath curPath;
00236         if ( relative )
00237                 curPath = _rootPath + dirPath;
00238         else
00239                 curPath = dirPath;
00240 
00241         const tstring& dir = curPath.GetPathString();
00242         const char *separators = "/\\";
00243 
00244         tstring::size_type start = 0;
00245         tstring::size_type end = dir.find_first_of( separators, 0 );
00246         while ( end != tstring::npos )
00247         {
00248                 end = dir.find_first_of( separators, ++end );
00249                 ::CreateDirectory( curPath.GetPathString().substr( 0, end ).c_str(), 0 );
00250         }
00251 }

00253 //----------------------------------------------------------
00254 void
00255 RFileMgr::GetDirListing( std::vector< UPath >* files, std::vector< UPath >* folders, const UPath& relativeDirPath )
00256 {
00259         if ( folders )
00260                 folders->reserve( 256 );
00261         if ( files )
00262                 files->reserve( 256 );
00263 
00265         UPath curPath;
00266         CreateFullPath( curPath, relativeDirPath );
00267 
00269         WIN32_FIND_DATA findData;
00270         HANDLE findHandle = FindFirstFile( curPath.GetPathString().c_str(), &findData );
00271         if ( findHandle == INVALID_HANDLE_VALUE )
00272                 return;
00273 
00274         do
00275         {
00277                 if ( findData.dwFileAttributes & FILE_ATTRIBUTE_DIRECTORY )
00278                 {
00279                         if ( folders )
00280                                 if ( strcmp( findData.cFileName, ".." ) != 0 && strcmp( findData.cFileName, "." ) != 0 )
00281                                         folders->push_back( findData.cFileName );
00282                 }
00283                 else 
00284                 {
00285                         if ( files )
00286                                 files->push_back( findData.cFileName );
00287                 }
00288 
00289         } while ( FindNextFile( findHandle, &findData ) );
00290 
00292         FindClose( findHandle );
00293 }

00295 //----------------------------------------------------------
00296 bool
00297 RFileMgr::CopyFile( const UPath& dstPath, const UPath& srcPath )
00298 {
00300         UPath localSrcPath;
00301         UPath localDstPath;
00302         CreateFullPath( localSrcPath, srcPath );
00303         CreateFullPath( localDstPath, dstPath );
00304 
00306         URef< RFile > srcFile = GetFile( localSrcPath, kFlagRead );
00307         if ( !srcFile )
00308                 return false;
00309 
00311         URef< RFile > dstFile = GetFile( localDstPath, kFlagCreateAlways | kFlagWrite );
00312         if ( !dstFile )
00313                 return false;
00314 
00316         if ( srcFile->GetSize() > ~0U )
00317                 return false;
00318 
00320         dstFile->WriteData( 0, srcFile->GetData(), ( unsigned int )srcFile->GetSize() );
00321 
00323         return true;
00324 }

00331 //----------------------------------------------------------
00332 void
00333 RFileMgr::CreateFullPath( UPath& fullPath, const UPath& path )
00334 {
00336         if ( path.GetPathString().find( ':' ) == tstring::npos )
00337                 fullPath = _rootPath + path;
00338         else
00339                 fullPath = path;
00340 }
